name: Recursive Cartography, a brief introduction
description:
Define Recursive Cartography: 
See: Recursive Cartography.

An infinite tower to survey is no small task, even for a master cartographer. Craft your path through recursively connected floors.

Solve fiendishly difficult puzzles designed for analytical thinkers and ascend to freedom through 7 levels. Your success is statistically improbable.

FAQ

What do I do if I receive an error trying to launch?

Please let me know. Due to limitations in itch.io I had to host externally, so it is possible I will hit a bandwidth quota at some point in time during the review process

Why this subject matter?

Created for the GMTK2021 jam theme 'Joined Together', this game explores a connection on two levels:

(1) "Gluing" together map fragments to traverse through an infinite tower, and

(2) Uncovering the intrinsic recursive connections that bind floors together

In both cases, the player also experiences the fragility of theses connections, as entire floors of the tower are wiped from the player's cartographical canon.

Can I get that sweet sweet source code?

https://github.com/aaron-henselin/gmtk2021-JoinedTogether-Cartograph
